titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.
Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - Pursuant to clause 2(a)(1) of rule IX, Mr. Thompson (MS) was recognized to present a resolution raising a question of the privileges of the House. The Clerk reported the text of the resolution and the Chair announced the determination that the resolution constituted a question of privilege.

reference.ref: text of measure as introduced in House CR H4662-4663

action.text: Mr. McCarthy moved to refer to House Administration.
Floor summary: DEBATE - The House proceeded with 1 hour of debate on the McCarthy (CA) motion to refer H. Res. 341 to the Committee on House Administration.
The previous question on the motion to refer was ordered without objection.
On motion to refer Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 240 - 184 (Roll no. 385).
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Requires the Speaker of the House of Representatives to: (1) remove any state flag containing any portion of the Confederate battle flag, other than a flag displayed by the office of a Member of the House, from any area within the House wing of the Capitol or any House office building; and (2) donate any such flag to the Library of Congress.
